dcterms:creator: H. Anfinson
O. Aamo
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the stabilization of a linear hyperbolic PDE with actuator and sensor dynamics, focusing on control problems arising from bidirectionally coupled systems.
dcterms:title: Coupled Linear Parabolic ODE-PDE-ODE Systems

dcterms:creator: D. Bou Saba
F. Bribiesca-Argomedo
M. Di Loreto
D. Eberard
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the backstepping stabilization of 2Ã—2 linear hyperbolic PDEs that are coupled with potentially unstable actuator and load dynamics.
dcterms:title: Coupled Reaction-Diffusion Processes

dcterms:creator: L. Camacho-Solorio
R. Vazquez
M. Krstic
dcterms:description: This dataset provides boundary observers for coupled diffusion-reaction systems, focusing on achieving a prescribed convergence rate.
dcterms:title: Coupled Diffusion-Reaction Systems

dcterms:creator: J. Deutscher
S. Kerschbaum
dcterms:description: This dataset involves backstepping control of coupled linear parabolic PIDEs with spatially varying coefficients, focusing on control design methodologies.
dcterms:title: Coupled Linear Parabolic PIDEs

dcterms:creator: J. Deutscher
S. Kerschbaum
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on output regulation for coupled linear parabolic PIDEs, addressing control challenges in distributed systems.
dcterms:title: Coupled Linear Parabolic PIDEs

dcterms:creator: Y. Orlov
A. Pisano
A. Pilloni
E. Usai
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses output feedback stabilization of coupled reaction-diffusion processes with constant parameters, focusing on control strategies.
dcterms:title: Coupled Reaction-Diffusion Processes

dcterms:creator: R. Vazquez
M. Krstic
dcterms:description: This dataset involves boundary control of coupled reaction-advection-diffusion systems with spatially varying coefficients, focusing on control methodologies.
dcterms:title: Coupled Reaction-Advection-Diffusion Systems
